    Welcome to TADkit!

    Jan 1, 2017 / news

    Welcome to the updated TADkit documentation site. Currently we are developing Tadkit v1.0 for release in February 2017. Meanwhile v0.2 includes the following updates: Automated extraction of ngdoc tags API via Dgeni. Documentation site via Github Pages with Jekyll. Fix to THREEjs memory leak.
